metadata.synopsis: A hostage has locked themselves in the storage room, waiting for a chance to escape. They need someone to press the lever to open the door and scream for help.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the zone infront of the escaping hostage's locked door. They will play the AD automatically.

0.speaker: Obelia Toobin
0.text: Gond's grace! I knew someone would come - please, the lever!
